entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:07 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few rain showers this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
